thread.title: Credentials Solutions Now Offers PDF Transcripts to Students Utilizing Graduate School Application Services Managed by Liaison
thread.title_full: Credentials Solutions Now Offers PDF Transcripts to Students Utilizing Graduate School Application Services Managed by Liaison

author: admin
title: Credentials Solutions Now Offers PDF Transcripts to Students Utilizing Graduate School Application Services Managed by Liaison
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 5:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Credentials Solutions 
NORTHFIELD, Ill., Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Credentials Solutions is now sending PDF transcripts to graduate school application services managed by Liaison, the leader in admissions management and enrollment marketing solutions for higher education. This enhancement applies to students and alumni ordering from institutions utilizing the TranscriptsPlus(®) ordering platform. 
After a successful launch with the Schools of Public Health Application Service (SOPHAS) on August 28(th), the remaining seventeen application services shown below are now live with PDF receiving. Credentials collects a student's unique User ID during the transcript ordering process and automatically generates an XML header for each PDF to expedite processing. 
Over the last 12 months, Credentials schools have sent nearly 45,000 paper transcripts to Liaison. In past experiences deploying PDFs with AMCAS and LSAC, Credentials has sent almost 60% of applicant transcripts electronically. As a result, the entire process has been streamlined for Liaison, allowing for more efficient application processing. It also gives students peace of mind by shortening the amount of time it takes for transcripts to reach their destinations. As the Credentials eScrip-Safe Network continues to grow, the percentage of PDFs sent will increase, resulting in an even greater financial impact. 
The application services covered by this enhancement are: AADSAS Associated American Dental Schools Application Service AAPIC Association of Psychology Postdoc Internship Center ADEA PASS American Dental Education Association Postdoctoral Application Support Service AHCAS Allied Health Centralized Application Service CASPA Application Service Physician's Assistants CSDCAS Communication Science & Disorders Application Service DHCAS ADEA Dental Hygiene Centralized Application Service DICAS Dietetic Internship Central Application System HAMPCAS Healthcare Administration, Management & Policy Centralized Application Service NDCAS Doctor of Naturopathic Medicine Application Service NURSINGCAS Nursing's Centralized Application Service OPCAS Orthotics & Prosthetics Application Service OPTOMCAS Optometry Centralized Application Service OTCAS Occupational Therapy Centralized Application Service PHARMCAS Pharmacy College Application Service PTCAS Physical Therapist Centralized Application Service SOPHAS Schools of Public Health Application Service VMCAS American Veterinary Medical Colleges 
About Credentials Solutions Credentials Solutions develops innovative transcript solutions to fit the unique needs of higher education. RoboRegistrar(®) has been automating transcript processing since 2003, while an expansive network of senders and receivers allows students, alumni, institutions and organizations to exchange PDF, EDI and XML formats. Coupling this electronic transcript reach with print and mail service eRoboMail(®) streamlines the entire transcript process from ordering through fulfillment. 
About Liaison Liaison helps higher education institutions identify, recruit and enroll best-fit students with improved outreach, application and enrollment processes. More than 5,000 programs rely on their admissions management and marketing automation software and services to reach prospective students, streamline administrative tasks and create exceptional experiences for applicants across the full enrollment cycle - from first interest to first day on campus. To learn more, visit www.liaison-intl.com .
